body: # cardy This projects contains css and javascript files to display cards on your html pages. You can use css class directly or use shortcuts that will be replaced by javascripts. ## Usage How to display an ace of spades ? ```html A ``` Usage is very simple. First tell you want to view a card (here A for Ace) than complete with your color as css class. You can also display four colors deck. ```html A A A A ``` ## Javascript You can also display your card with javascript. All you need is to type a simple code. ```html [As] [Ah] ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
